name: SetVehicleHealth
notes: Full vehicle health is 1000. Higher values are possible. For more information on health values, see this page.
description: Set a vehicle's health. When a vehicle's health decreases the engine will produce smoke, and finally fire when it decreases to less than 250 (25%).

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the health of.

params_body.name: Float:health
params_body.description: The health, given as a float value.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the vehicle does not exist.
related_fn:
GetVehicleHealth: Check the health of a vehicle.
 RepairVehicle: Fully repair a vehicle.
 SetPlayerHealth: Set a player's health.
 OnVehicleDeath: Called when a vehicle is destroyed.
related_cb: OnVehicleDeath: Called when a vehicle is destroyed.
